parameters.name: AliasName
parameters.description: The alias of the vulnerability.

parameters.name: ClusterId
parameters.description:
The ID of the container cluster.

> You can call the [DescribeGroupedContainerInstances](~~DescribeGroupedContainerInstances~~) operation to query the ID of the container cluster.

parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: CveId
parameters.description: The Common Vulnerabilities and Exposures (CVE) ID of the vulnerability.

parameters.name: GroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the asset group.

parameters.name: ImageDigest
parameters.description: The SHA-256 value of the image digest.

parameters.name: ImageLayer
parameters.description: The layer of the image.

parameters.name: ImageTag
parameters.description: The tag of the image.

parameters.name: IsLatest
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to query the vulnerabilities in the latest images. If you do not specify this parameter, the vulnerabilities in all images are queried. Valid values:

*   **0**: does not query the vulnerabilities in the latest images.
*   **1**: queries the vulnerabilities in the latest images.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the request and response. Default value: **zh**. Valid values:

*   **zh**: Chinese
*   **en**: English

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the vulnerability.

parameters.name: Necessity
parameters.description:
The priority to fix the vulnerability. Valid values:

*   **asap**: high. You must fix the vulnerability at the earliest opportunity.
*   **later**: medium. You can fix the vulnerability based on your business requirements.
*   **nntf**: low. You can ignore the vulnerability.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Default value: **20**.

parameters.name: PatchId
parameters.description: The ID of the patch that is used to fix the vulnerability.

parameters.name: RepoId
parameters.description: The ID of the image repository.

parameters.name: RepoInstanceId
parameters.description: The instance ID of the image repository.

parameters.name: RepoName
parameters.description: The name of the image repository.

parameters.name: RepoNamespace
parameters.description: The namespace to which the image repository belongs.

parameters.name: RepoRegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the image repository.

parameters.name: ScanRange
parameters.description: An array consisting of the types of the assets that you want to scan.

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description:
The type of the vulnerability that you want to query. Valid values:

*   **cve**: image system vulnerability
*   **sca**: image application vulnerability

parameters.name: Uuids
parameters.description: The UUID of the asset. Separate multiple UUIDs with commas (,).
